artist: Artist: Utagawa Toyokuni; Publisher: Izumiya Ichibei
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper with mica
portfolio: From Portraits of Actors on Stage (Yakusha butai no sugata-e 役者舞台之姿絵)
text: The actor Segawa Kikunojō III (1751-1810) as the maid Ohama in the play "Hana no miyako kuruwa no nawabari" 花都廓縄張, performed at the Miyako Theater in the intercalary 11th lunar month of 1794.
title: Hamamuraya (Actor Segawa Kikunojō III as the Maid Ohama)
